fava.functionable
Class Sequence<T>

java.lang.Object
  fava.functionable.Functionable<T>
      fava.functionable.Sequence<T>
Type Parameters:
T -
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Range
public class Sequence<T>
extends Functionable<T>

Produces a sequence of values by taking an initial value and a FnMap to produce the next value from the current one.

Author:
Nathaniel Sherry, 2010-2011

          Empty constructor for subclassing
